Package domainlayer.model

Class RepVec

  • java.lang.Object
    • domainlayer.model.RepVec
  • public class RepVec
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains all the information from the document needed for calculating the ressemlance between documents

              int n)

        Parameters:
        lp - List of words in the document where the first value is the word and the second it's an array of the positcion of the words
        n - Number of words in the document
